$$
P(|\bar{X}_{n}| > {x}_{n} | H_0) = P(\bar{X}_{n} \leq - {x}_{n} | H_0)  + P(\bar{X}_{n} \geq {x}_{n} | H_0) 
$$

$$
P(|\bar{X}_{n}| > {x}_{n} | H_0)  = 2 \times P(\bar{X}_{n} \leq - {x}_{n} | H_0)  
$$

$$
\begin{align*}
P(|\bar{X}_{n}| > {x}_{n} | H_0) &= P(\bar{X}_{n} \leq - {x}_{n} | H_0)  + \\
&+ 1 - P(\bar{X}_{n} < {x}_{n} | H_0) \\
\end{align*}
$$

$$
\begin{align*}
P(|\bar{X}_{n}| > {x}_{n} | H_0) &= P(\bar{X}_{n} \leq - {x}_{n} | H_0)  + \\
&+ 1 - P(\bar{X}_{n} < {x}_{n} | H_0) \\
\end{align*}
$$

$$
\frac{\bar{X}_{n} - \mu}{\sqrt{\sigma^2/n}} \sim \mathcal{N}\left(0,1\right)
$$

$$
(n-1) \frac{S^2}{\sigma^2} \sim \chi^2_{n-1}
$$

$$
\begin{align*}
U &\sim& \mathcal{N}\left(0,1\right) \\
V &\sim& \chi^2_{n} \\
\frac{U}{\sqrt{V/n}} &\sim& t_{n} \\
\end{align*}
$$

$$
\frac{\bar{T}_{n} - \mu}{\sqrt{S^2/n}} \sim t_{n-1}
$$

$$
\frac{\bar{T}_{30} - \mu}{\sqrt{S^2/30}} \sim t_{n-1} = t_{29}
$$

$$
T_{post} \sim \mathcal{N}\left(1.75,0.5^2\right)
$$



$$
t_{obs} = \frac{\bar{t}_{30} - \mu_0}{\sqrt{S^2/30}} 
$$

$$
t_{obs} = \frac{\bar{t}_{30} - \mu_0}{\sqrt{S^2/30}} 
$$

$$
t_{obs} = \frac{\bar{t}_{30} - \mu_0}{\sqrt{S^2/n}} = \frac{\bar{t}_{30} - 1.5}{\sqrt{S^2/30}}  = \frac{1.73 - 1.5}{\sqrt{0.09^2/30}} = 2.53 
$$



$$
P\left( \left| \frac{\bar{T}_{30} - \mu_0}{\sqrt{S^2/30}} \right| > t_{obs} \right)
$$

$$
P\left( \left| \frac{\bar{T}_{30} -1.5}{\sqrt{S^2/30}} \right| > t_{obs} \right) = 2 \times P \left( \frac{\bar{T}_{30} - 1.5}{\sqrt{S^2/30}} < - t_{obs} \right)
